TextView.tools:text: With a vibrant hip-hop scene and dynamic international population, Toronto is quietly gaining a reputation for its unique sartorial sensibility – one that’s more urban than rugged and rural. Daniel Habashi – Soho House’s Montreal-born, Toronto-based global chief digital officer, CMO for North America and our resident sneakerhead – knows more than a little bit about local street style. Here he shares his hit list of the Toronto based stores that stock the most in-demand kicks.
